sentence.Network_en: The war in 1939 perforce ushered in an era of more grime and drabness.
sentence.Network_cn: 1939年的战争必然导致一个更加肮脏、更加灰暗的时代的到来。

sentence.Network_en: Now, being , perforce, idle himself, he wondered at the activity of others.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在他自己被迫闲了下来, 都不知道别人在忙乎些什么了.

sentence.Network_en: He had settled to his safety and accepted perforce his extinction.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已习惯于苟安,被迫接受自己的湮没.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 十五级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... percolate v. 过滤出， 渗透 perforce ad. 必然地 periwig n. 假发.

list.abs: the story is perforce true .情况属实.
he stood up , and they perforce stood up with him他站起身来，他们只好同他一起站起身来
end users perforce learned how to invoke applications via commands .最终用户必须学会如何通过命令来调用应用程序。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French par force 'by force'

encyclopedia.content: Perforce是一款商业软件，官方主页： http://www.perforce.com/，他们定义Perforce为软件配置管理系统。 一般简称P4，系统由服务器端，客户端组成，还包括若干中介服务器 (Proxy Server)。 客户端会有GUI界面，命令行界面，Web界面。

entry.def: Perforce is used to indicate that something happens or is the case because it cannot be prevented or avoided.

example.ex: The war in 1939 perforce ushered in an era of more grime and drabness.
example.tran: 1939年的战争必然导致一个更加肮脏、更加灰暗的时代的到来。

means.word_mean: 1. by necessity; by force of circumstance

auth_sentence.content: On a temporary footing which perforce grew longer, I remained.
auth_sentence.res_content: On a temporary footing which perforce grew longer, I remained.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On a temporary footing which perforce grew longer, I remained.

auth_sentence.content: You, perforce, must couch EVERYTHING in those simplistic and backward terms.
auth_sentence.res_content: You, perforce, must couch EVERYTHING in those simplistic and backward terms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You, perforce, must couch EVERYTHING in those simplistic and backward terms.

auth_sentence.content: One may be, perforce or by intention, an astrophysicist one day and a high-energy physicist the next.
auth_sentence.res_content: One may be, perforce or by intention, an astrophysicist one day and a high-energy physicist the next.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One may be, perforce or by intention, an astrophysicist one day and a high-energy physicist the next.
